ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:46:32 [Issue ID 4000-170797] urn:comicvine:4000-170797 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 01:38:46. [Issue ID 64641]
ComicInfo.Summary: The new Eternal Champion epic continues in the 12-issue maxiseries written by one of the most renowned fantasy and science-fiction writers of our time! In "Moonbeams and Roses," Paul Minct is captured by the soulless Machinoix, who read in his scars the history of the Rose's once-beautiful universe; "The Metatemporal Detective" continues to investigate the death of Hitler's girlfriend, as the case turns scandalous; and "Duke Elric" faces a lingering death in the Arabian desert.
ComicInfo.Title: Part Four: Loser Wins; Part 4: Fear and Trembling; Part Four: Soul in the Iron
